actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to eliminate the one-third benefit reduction presently applicable to individuals receiving support and maintenance in kind from families with whom they are living.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) (SSI) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the one-third SSI benefit reduction applicable to individuals receiving support and maintenance in kind from families with whom they reside.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to eliminate the one-third benefit reduction presently applicable to individuals receiving support and maintenance in kind from families with whom they are living.
